Copernicus EU

partner

https://www.copernicus.eu

The Copernicus programme monitors the Earth using satellite data to support environmental management, climate monitoring, and disaster response in Europe.

Industry

space

Category

programme

Green Orbit Digital

A full-service digital marketing agency specialising in the space and technology sectors, delivering data-driven strategies that drive growth, engagement, and impact. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to optimise campaigns, create compelling content, and implement sustainable digital solutions that amplify their mission and reach.
